topic.title: Red Hat Software Requirements
topic.shortdesc: Red Hat Enterprise Linux v6.5 must be obtained via one of the following means prior to installation:

body.note: Alternately, you can use CentOS 6.5; however, support for CentOS is limited to Dell hardware support only.
body.p: See Table 20: Dell | Cloudera Support Matrix on page 44 for a list of support options for Dell | Cloudera Solution components.
